    APPEND_ITEM LENGTH 32 UINT "Telemetry length"

    APPEND_ID_ITEM EVR_ID 32 UINT 558 "EVR ID"

        STATE SEQ_STEP_MODE 0
        STATE SEQ_AUTO_MODE 1

      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
